public abstract class AbstractStemmerLemmatizer
extends AbstractLemmatizer
implements IsCloseable, Lemmatizer

Use a stemmer as a pseudo-lemmatizer.

lemmatize

public java.lang.String lemmatize(java.lang.String spelling)

Specified by:

Specified by:

Parameters:

Returns:
The lemma. "*" is returned if the lemma cannot be found.
